txt.en: 'I noticed that the village of infected Orcs is full of unfamiliar totems. I suspect the Orcs may worship the bat-like creature carved into them. Something does not feel right about this and it would be a relief to see these totems destroyed.'
Stained Totems can be found in Faltor Gâm, the village of the Infected Orcs.\n\nYou should destroy Stained Totems.
Faeron can be found at Viznak's Hideout.\n\nYou should talk to Faeron.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. Destroying those totems soothes me, though I worry we may yet encounter the being they depict.'
TBD Go to Agarnaith Ranger Camp
The Orcs of Faltor Gâm seem to worship someone or something, and their totems give you a bad feeling. Faeron has asked you to destroy them while you are there.
